on reading compounds: 霰粒腫【サンリュウシュ】chalazion (sebaceous cyst of the eyelid), tarsal cyst
散弾銃【サンダンジュウ】shotgun
kun reading compounds: 霰【あられ】hail (esp. hailballs under 5 mm), graupel, dicing, small cubes, roasted mochi pieces (usu. flavoured with soy sauce, etc.)
雪あられ【ゆきあられ】soft hail, snow pellets
雛霰【ひなあられ】sweetened rice-flour cakes for offering at the Dolls' Festival
